node.address: Calle 23A No. 36A-10 - Sector Corferias , Bogota, Colombia

content.value: Hotel Fidenzi has featuring modern decor and furnishing, rooms have LCD TVs, and private bathrooms, our room service is provided and a nice breakfast. A garden and a patio are featured.

Bogota is the largest city of Colombia, our property is located in city centre and very near the El Dorado airport only 10 minutes drive, bus terminal are available to nearby.

We offer private rooms and the facilities are: Closet, Bathroom, Bathtub or shower, Toilet paper, TV, Telephone, Cable channels, Flat-screen TV, Towels, Linens, Free WiFi is available.

The Fidenzi Boutique Hotel is an elegant boutique hotel located in the town of Teusaquillo, 100 meters from Corferias; here you will find confo rtables rooms where you will discover all the comforts to make your stay the most enjoyable. We have highly qualified and professional staff, who will make you feel “Your home in the heart of Bogotá”

description.description:
At HOTEL FIDENZI, we want to make sure your stay is as comfortable as possible.
With free high-speed wireless Internet connection, and relaxing green areas, the FIDENZI Hotel is one of the best hotels in Bogota
